name: To The Abyss (Ryan Gehrlein, dshap, mkblumenau, lennieok)
name_original: To The Abyss (Ryan Gehrlein, dshap, mkblumenau, lennieok)
description:
You are a crab. Your beloved crab associate has been whisked away by the ocean. You must go on a journey to travel to the bottom of the ocean to rescue them, but as you travel further down, the darkness of the waters closes in. How far are you willing to go for your beloved crab associate?

Play through this demo of our game!

Credits:

Miles Blumenau- art, sound selection

Ryan Gehrlein- programming, music, mechanical design

Elena Kosowski- art, mechanical design

Daniel Shapiro- programming, level design

Various public domain sounds found on Freesound were used in this game.

Project website

This game was made as part of a Concept Development class at Northeastern University in spring 2022. Check out the games made by other members of our class:

Supreme Fortnight

Fruitnight

Papercraft Plunders
